title: Free double bedroom available
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hi,

I have free double bedroom, which will be a flat share with a mature Male in South West London. The room would suit good looking female with a opened mind.

Nearest overground stations are Barnes Bridge & Barnes, nearest tube station is Hammersmith tube station (Piccadilly-Circle-Hammsmith line) 10-15 minutes by bus.

Can offer allowance (if needed).

Please attach picture of yourself with message.

Write back for more information and details.

Good luck
